title: Manage Crew Rest Periods
description: A crew dispatcher must ensure that a train crew does not violate federally mandated rest period rules.

tasks.description: Review the duty history for a crew being considered for a new assignment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the crew's work history for the last 7 days.

tasks.description: The system automatically calculates the crew's available work hours before they must begin a mandatory rest period.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system shows the crew has 6 hours of duty time left.

tasks.description: Compare the available hours to the estimated trip time for the new assignment.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent sees the trip is estimated to take 8 hours, meaning this crew cannot legally complete it.

tasks.description: Select a different, fully-rested crew for the assignment.
tasks.expected_outcome: A compliant crew is assigned to the train.
